import React from 'react'; import styles from './Product.module.css' import {BsCurrencyDollar} from "react-icons/all"; import Button from "../helpers/button/Button"; const Product =(props)=> { const deleteProduct = (id) => { alert("delete") } return

{props.product.description}

Price:

} export default Product;
